title: Practice Challenge
description: After each guess, show the narrowed range: ---
instructions: After each guess, show the narrowed range: ---

testCases.description: Game shows narrowed range after high guess
testCases.expectedOutput: Too high! The number is between 1 and 49

testCases.description: Game narrows range after low guess
testCases.expectedOutput: Too low! The number is between 26 and 100

hints.text: Read the instructions carefully and break down the problem into smaller steps.
If stuck, try writing out the solution in plain English first, then convert to dart code.

commonMistakes.correction: Use exact case: main not Main, print not Print
